remarks: If ` R ` partially orders ` A ` , then the transitive predecessors are the same as the immediate predecessors .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 28-Apr-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement: trpredpo $p |- ( ( R Po A /\ X e. A /\ R Se A ) -> TrPred ( R , A , X ) = Pred ( R , A , X ) ) $.
